scripts.test: npm run csslint && npm run jshint
scripts.start: npm run process:other:watch & npm run postcss:watch & npm run process:js:watch && wait
scripts.pkg: npm run clean && npm run process:other && npm run postcss && npm run process:js && zip -q -r build/pkg-$npm_package_version.zip dist
scripts.postcss: mkdir -p dist/styles && postcss $npm_package_config_postcss_args node_modules/hovercardsshared/styles/*.css -d dist/styles/ && postcss $npm_package_config_postcss_args app/styles/*.css -d dist/styles/
scripts.postcss:watch: mkdir -p dist/styles && postcss $npm_package_config_postcss_args node_modules/hovercardsshared/styles/*.css -w -d dist/styles/ & postcss $npm_package_config_postcss_args app/styles/*.css -w -d dist/styles/
scripts.process:js: mkdir -p dist/scripts && npm run browserify && npm run browserify:frames && npm run uglifyjs
scripts.process:js:watch: npm run watchify:background & npm run watchify:frames & npm run watchify:options & npm run watchify:soundcloud-player
scripts.browserify: mkdir -p dist/scripts && echo background-main.js options-main.js soundcloud-player-main.js | xargs -I FILENAME -n 1 browserify app/scripts/FILENAME -o dist/scripts/FILENAME -r ./app/scripts/production-env.js:env -t [ jstify --templateOpts [ --variable data ] ]
scripts.browserify:frames: mkdir -p dist/scripts && browserify app/scripts/everywhere-main.js app/scripts/top-frame-main.js -p [ factor-bundle -o dist/scripts/everywhere-main.js -o dist/scripts/top-frame-main.js ] -o dist/scripts/common-main.js -r ./app/scripts/production-env.js:env -t [ jstify --templateOpts [ --variable data ] ]
scripts.uglifyjs: mkdir -p dist/scripts && find dist/scripts -name \*.js | xargs -I FILENAME uglifyjs FILENAME -o FILENAME -c drop_console=true,warnings=false --stats
scripts.watchify:background: mkdir -p dist/scripts && watchify app/scripts/background-main.js -o dist/scripts/background-main.js -r ./app/scripts/development-env.js:env -t [ jstify --templateOpts [ --variable data ] ] -v -d
scripts.watchify:frames: mkdir -p dist/scripts && watchify app/scripts/everywhere-main.js app/scripts/top-frame-main.js -p [ factor-bundle -o dist/scripts/everywhere-main.js -o dist/scripts/top-frame-main.js ] -o dist/scripts/common-main.js -r ./app/scripts/development-env.js:env -t [ jstify --templateOpts [ --variable data ] ] -v -d
scripts.watchify:options: mkdir -p dist/scripts && watchify app/scripts/options-main.js -o dist/scripts/options-main.js -r ./app/scripts/development-env.js:env -t [ jstify --templateOpts [ --variable data ] ] -v -d
scripts.watchify:soundcloud-player: mkdir -p dist/scripts && watchify app/scripts/soundcloud-player-main.js -o dist/scripts/soundcloud-player-main.js -r ./app/scripts/development-env.js:env -t [ jstify --templateOpts [ --variable data ] ] -v -d
